mapper.insert: insert into rank_game(no, s_no, st_no, gametime, min_people, max_people, gendertype, req_rank, payment, managerfee) values(rank_sq.nextval, ${s_no}, ${st_no}, #{gametime}, ${min_people}, ${max_people}, #{gendertype}, ${req_rank}, ${payment}, ${managerfee})
mapper.select: select r.no, r.s_no, r.st_no ,r.gametime, r.min_people, r.max_people, r.curr_people, r.gendertype, r.req_rank, r.payment, s.sportname, s.filename, st.stadium, st.location, m.m_name from rank_game r, sport s, stadium_info st, manager m where r.no=${no} and r.s_no = s.s_no and r.st_no = st.st_no and r.managerid = m.managerid
